name: Reindeer Food
author: inkmistress
summary: This snack mix is so addictive, it's known as 'Christmas Crack' among my circle of friends and family! You can choose a holiday mix of M&M's® to make these extra festive!
ingredients: 1 (17.5 ounce) package crispy corn cereal squares (such as Corn Chex®)
1 (14 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
directions: Cover a large area of counter space with waxed paper and tape it down
Mix pretzels, corn cereal squares, peanuts, and candy-coated milk chocolate pieces together in a large bowl
Melt white chocolate in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching
Pour melted white chocolate over pretzel mixture; stir to evenly coat
Quickly transfer mixture to the prepared waxed paper and spread in a thin layer; cool completely
Break into pieces and store in an airtight container
